long_description: Make packing easy with these lightweight bags that compress your sweaters or other bulky clothing by up to 80%. Zip closures open wide for packing. Patented 1-way pressure valves release air, allowing you to easily compress the bag by rolling it up. See-through polyethylene makes it easy to locate clothes in your suitcase or pack. Includes 2 different sized bags suitable for compressing sweaters, coats or several shirts. Dimensions of bags are 24.5 x 15.5 inches and 28.5 x 17.5 inches.
short_description: Make packing easy with these lightweight bags that compress your sweaters or other bulky clothing by up to 80%.
